park-name-type.description: Official legal name with Unicode characters; check against legal names in BCGNIS and notify if there is a discrepancy. We should not automatically update this from BCGNIS because our copy might be more accurate.
Official legal name with HTML-escaped Unicode characters
English phonetically spelled name; possibly drawn from BCGNIS
Name spelled using basic ASCII character set
Alternate spelling to enhance searchability; such as with no spaces and no punctuation
Historical name that is no longer official, but the area may still be known by this name; these can be drawn from BCGNIS
